title: (x) "Drengene Fra - Angora" DVD cover - League Night, Neutraface {Dav}
content:
I am having troubles identifying the script font here. I know some of you other weirdos can solve the puzzle.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [get-picture.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063309/http:/typophile.com/files/get-picture.jpeg) | 22.37 KB |
author: deadsumo

comments.content:
' [League Night](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063309/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=7&subpage=viewfonts)' _( House-A-Rama )_, by / from House Industries  
_( And, ' [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063309/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18&subpage=viewfonts)' )_

_( Does that make me one of the 'other weirdos' ? :)_

Dav

thanks...

I knew it was there at right foot. I mean, very basic to use two House types in th same design :)

Yes, you are a whackoweirdowhateverneversane butreallyfuc...! :) (just as the rest - including myself of cause :)

Yup, vertified loons is what we are. Pray we never find out where you live... :^D

(Jus' pullin' yo' leg)
You know where i live. I'm your neighbour here in Typoville. ;)
